line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: ZH.JumpBeacon.Respawn
* DESCRIPTION: Called by ZH.Monitor during an OCV playthrough.
* This script is called every 90 minutes. On all difficulties, 1 beacon is guaranteed to respawn in a sector with a Phanon outpost, as long as the sector does not have a jump beacon.
* On hard difficulty and up, Phanon can get additional jump beacons spawned in their sectors.
* On insane, the chance is increased to 20% within Phanon territory. Additionally, 10% chance to spawn jump beacons in commonwealth (including Yaki) space.
* The number of attempts to spawn in commonwealth space is equal to the number of sectors Phanon owns.
* AUTHOR: DATE: 16 November 2025
* Check if there a jump beacon! If not, the first spawn is guaranteed. After that, 10% chance on hard or 20% chance on insane to spawn additional beacons.
* Add-Ons 1.4.24: Fixed - removed flags.
* Guaranteed spawn is all that's needed on easy/normal. But on hard/insane, we're not done yet - move to the next outpost.
* Spawn additional beacons for hard and insane.
* Must have no beacon in this sector to spawn additional beacons.
* Insane mode doubles the chance to spawn in Phanon space.
* Get the number of Phanon sectors in the galaxy; save this as max number of attempts.
* Then, go through ALL commonwealth (including Yaki) sectors.
* For each sector in the array, attempt to spawn a beacon until Phanon is out of attempts.
* Hard difficulty has a 2.5% chance.
* Insane mode has 10% chance.
* Get a randomized list of sectors.
* Stop if we've reached our attempt budget.
* The only sectors allowed are Argon, Boron, Split, Paranid, Teladi, Terran, and Yaki. If the sector owner isn't any of these, skip to next sector in the list.
* Check if there a jump beacon! If yes, skip this sector and try again in another sector.
* 2.5% chance on hard to spawn a beacon, 10% chance on insane instead.

sval.val: Прыжковый маяк Фэнонов
Прыжковый маяк Фэнонов
Прыжковый маяк Фэнонов
SCRIPT NAME: ZH.JumpBeacon.Respawn
DESCRIPTION: Called by ZH.Monitor during an OCV playthrough.
This script is called every 90 minutes. On all difficulties, 1 beacon is guaranteed to respawn in a sector with a Phanon outpost, as long as the sector does not have a jump beacon.
On hard difficulty and up, Phanon can get additional jump beacons spawned in their sectors.
On insane, the chance is increased to 20% within Phanon territory. Additionally, 10% chance to spawn jump beacons in commonwealth (including Yaki) space.
The number of attempts to spawn in commonwealth space is equal to the number of sectors Phanon owns.
AUTHOR: DATE: 16 November 2025
Check if there a jump beacon! If not, the first spawn is guaranteed. After that, 10% chance on hard or 20% chance on insane to spawn additional beacons.
Add-Ons 1.4.24: Fixed - removed flags.
Guaranteed spawn is all that's needed on easy/normal. But on hard/insane, we're not done yet - move to the next outpost.
Spawn additional beacons for hard and insane.
Must have no beacon in this sector to spawn additional beacons.
Insane mode doubles the chance to spawn in Phanon space.
Get the number of Phanon sectors in the galaxy; save this as max number of attempts.
Then, go through ALL commonwealth (including Yaki) sectors.
For each sector in the array, attempt to spawn a beacon until Phanon is out of attempts.
Hard difficulty has a 2.5% chance.
Insane mode has 10% chance.
Get a randomized list of sectors.
Stop if we've reached our attempt budget.
The only sectors allowed are Argon, Boron, Split, Paranid, Teladi, Terran, and Yaki. If the sector owner isn't any of these, skip to next sector in the list.
Check if there a jump beacon! If yes, skip this sector and try again in another sector.
2.5% chance on hard to spawn a beacon, 10% chance on insane instead.
